H1.text: who is the first indian woman to be canonized as a saint. Sister Nivedita

H2.text: who is the first indian woman to be canonized as a saint. Rani Rashmoni

H3.text: who is the first indian woman to be canonized as a saint. Saint Alphonsa

A4.text: Alphonsa was canonized on 12 October 2008 by Pope Benedict XVI, making her the first canonized saint from India.
